Navball.

Know the navball, love the navball. Become one with the navball. Because often your ship will be turned sideways on the screen, but from the ship's perspective it's tipped forward, so pressing A won't right it, it'll just rotate it around counterclockwise. And so on.

But the navball will tell you which way the ship thinks it's turned, so you'll see that the navball is sideways (in my example anyway) and know to turn up rather than sideways, or sideways rather than up, etc. etc. etc.
